Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits employers from discriminating against individuals based on such individual's status as a caregiver
Summary: Prohibits employers from discriminating against individuals based on such individual's status as a caregiver.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting employers from discriminating against individuals based on such individual's status as a caregiver
